doc:
Bill Scott (voice actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Scott_(voice_actor) 0 William John Scott (August 2, 1920 – November 29, 1985) was an American voice actor, writer and producer for animated cartoons, primarily associated with Jay Ward and UPA, as well as one of the founding members of ASIFA-Hollywood. William_John_Scott ( August_2_,_1920 – November_29_,_1985 ) was an_American_voice_actor , writer_and_producer for animated_cartoons , primarily_associated with Jay_Ward and UPA , as_well_as one of the_founding_members of ASIFA-Hollywood .
